meanings.sent1: She glunches whenever she has to do her chores.
meanings.sent2: He always glunches when he has to wake up early for school.
meanings.sent3: The cat glunches at me when I try to give it a bath.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds glunches ominously in the distance.
meanings.sent5: His face glunches with frustration as he tries to solve the puzzle.

meanings.sent1: Her glunches made it clear she was not happy with the situation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed the student's glunches during the test.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's glunches were so adorable, it was hard to stay mad at it.
meanings.sent4: The painting captured the glunches of the old man perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds outside mirrored her glunches as she waited for the news.
